title: Fragile
description: A short film by a team of students from Politecnico di Torino, exploring themes of vulnerability and human connection through a poignant narrative.
challenge: To effectively convey deep emotional themes within a limited runtime while maintaining high production quality.
solution: Collaborated closely with the scriptwriters and director to ensure a cohesive vision, utilized advanced filming techniques and post-production tools to enhance the storytelling, and focused on strong performances from the cast to bring authenticity to the characters.
